attributes.action: Move the Isle of Man TT to Silverstone so more people can attend.
attributes.additional_details: Don't allow sidecars to enter, they are boring.
attributes.background: The Isle of Man TT race is held on an island far away and it is very difficult to attend due to all the ferries being used for Brexit issues.  The cost of getting all the catering vehicles over to the island is prohibitive, it would be far better to hold it on the mainland at a fast race circuit.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the event organiser and not the UK Government or Parliament.
